content.txt1: Iyi mikorere irashobora gukora ibikorwa bisa nibikorwa byumuntu harimo, ariko ntibigarukira gusa gukanda, kubifungura porogaramu, nibindi kuri terefone yawe, kandi birashobora no gufungura porogaramu yo kwishyura yo kwishyura. Kuberako hari ingaruka zo kwandikirwa ibikorwa, kwishyura, nibindi, turasaba cyane ko ubishyira mu bikorwa niba usobanukiwe neza ibikubiye mu nyandiko.
content.txt2: Nigute ushobora gufunga iki gikorwa: Fungura urupapuro rwurugo rwiyi porogaramu, urashobora guhagarika gukoresha imikorere ifasha murupapuro rwibihe, cyangwa urashobora gukanda "kurangiza imirimo yose hanyuma usohoke" kurupapuro rwurugo. Iyi buto ihatira gusoza imirimo yose ikorwa kandi ihatira gufunga iyi porogaramu.
content.txt3: Impamvu dukoresha iki gikorwa nuko gusaba kwacu bigomba kugira ubushobozi bwo gufungura izindi porogaramu no kuyigenzura, nko kohereza ubutumwa ku nshuti za interineti buri gihe, kandi wohereze ibikorwa bishimishije cyangwa ibikorwa bishimishije cyangwa byo kuzigama.
content.title: Ibikorwa biteje akaga
